What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Dining Out > Other - Dining Out > Resolved Question Hypnotic Hannah Member since: December 19, 2008 Total points: 1,178 (Level 3) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » What should I name my restaurant? It will be a casual place, order and pick up at counter... serving regular soups and salads and all the entrees will change seasonally and weekly. In a small town, in a new development.
I'm trying to think of something cute and clever... the kind of name that has you saying"honey can you pick up _______ after work?"But not too cute like"Yummies"which is one that I was tossing around! Got any ideas? Thank you! 4 years ago Report Abuse
Additional Details "Mommy, Mommy, I want Krusty Krabs"roflmao. 4 years ago by Music Man Member since: March 02, 2006 Total points: 156,176 (Level 7) Badge Image: Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker Creekwood Cafe 4 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good Asker's Rating: Asker's Comment: Wow! I had a hard time choosing best answer because there were so many good ideas! I really liked seasons and I also liked the advice to go with a family name and not be too corney.. but this one is perfect because it totally goes with the town and it's really charming. Thank you so much! Action Bar: 1 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 0 ) Save Add to My Yahoo! Add to Del.icio.us RSS
There are currently no comments for this question.
* You must be logged into Answers to add comments. Sign in or Register .
Other Answers (11) Show: All Answers Oldest to Newest Newest to Oldest Rated Highest to Lowest by annie Member since: December 02, 2007 Total points: 604 (Level 2) Add Contact Block Souper Square ( square because Soup Salad,,,Souper as in super and soup)
Salads, Soups and So much more....( alliteration) or Salads,Soups, and what more
Salad Stop
Soup Shack
One Stop DInner Shop
i hope you like them.....VOTE FOR BEST ANSWER..Please 4 years ago Report Abuse
2 people rated this as good by tjb2676 Member since: July 05, 2006 Total points: 848 (Level 2) Add Contact Block use either your mom or your Grandmother's middle name. in a small town where small town values may exist, they may respect and appreciate an actual name opposed to some corny catch phrase. 4 years ago Report Abuse
3 people rated this as good by Reno Member since: August 12, 2007 Total points: 492 (Level 2) Add Contact Block The Krusty Krab.
lmao jplay
why don't you name it something that no knows about yourself, but at the same time something that is fun and unique 4 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by Jordan B Member since: November 15, 2008 Total points: 178 (Level 1) Add Contact Block u should name it after an important location or monument in ur city and put grand in front of it. Trust me it works Source(s): i r edjmacated 4 years ago Report Abuse by G*G* Member since: March 23, 2006 Total points: 13,146 (Level 6) Add Contact Block "Why Cook?"I always thought that would be a cute name for a quick fast&easy restaurant! 4 years ago Report Abuse by lostintr... Member since: November 04, 2008 Total points: 1,377 (Level 3) Add Contact Block "what's for dinner?" "hole in the wall restaurant" "diamond in the grub" 4 years ago Report Abuse by Akmal Member since: November 20, 2008 Total points: 610 (Level 2) Add Contact Block The Old Times 4 years ago Report Abuse by Dinkles Member since: May 10, 2008 Total points: 4,096 (Level 4) Add Contact Block No Soup For You 4 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by Emily B Member since: December 25, 2008 Total points: 54 (Level 1) Add Contact Block I would call it"time out" 4 years ago Report Abuse by lizzi Member since: December 30, 2008 Total points: 46 (Level 1) Add Contact Block Seasons =]
haha Krusty Krab. lol 4 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by mike c Member since: April 18, 2008 Total points: 2,800 (Level 4) Add Contact Block Hannahs House, hows that? 4 years ago Report Abuse
